Hey! I think I found the description and here it is.

Update Notes:
Update/Additions:
– 2560×1440 and 1440×900 screen resolution added.
– Aim Assist ON/OFF toggle added.
– Mouse Acceleration ON/OFF toggle added.

Bug fix:
– 120Hz Refresh Rate setting not saving under certain circumstance.

Instructions:

– Unrar the update.exe and run it ( point to your installation folder
 if required )
